name: ShipZ (DEMO)
description:
ENTER THE ACCESS CODE

THE ACCESS CODE IS ENTERED

WELCOME TO THE SYSTEM

ShipZ is a simple platformer with puzzles, as well as a mysterious plot.

2142 year. Humanity has already mastered space. On a huge space ship, something strange happened, the entire crew disappeared. You were sent as a robot to collect information about what happened. 
What lies ahead-you have yet to find out.

POSSIBLE PROBLEMS DURING INSTALLATION AND STARTUP

1) the Game is not installed - most likely there is not enough memory, or the installation is blocked by Google play

2) Does not start, crashes at startup - this happens, restart the game several times and it will work normally (probably)

This is a very early demo version, intended only to demonstrate technical capabilities.
If you find a bug, error, or have any suggestions about the game, please email me: mrprosuper@gmail.com
I will definitely try to help and listen to your opinion.
This is my first game that I started developing in earnest.

Plans for the release version:
- Add multiple translation languages
- More animations
- 15 Levels (3 stages of 5 levels)
- Enemies with AI
- Many different functions
- Sandbox
